channel.title: How can I put a date, time in BufferedWriter
channel.description:
Can someone please help me, this is something i've been trying to figure out for a long time... Please
I just need to put a time in thise strip.
[code] bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/commands.txt", true)); bw.write(playerName+" has used tempban on " +bannedUser.playerName);[/code]
I would want to know WHEN the command was used. So like date and time in front? Thanks so much!!!
